CutSceneText.Text: (A male voice can be hear talking excitedly somewhere.)
The ring! You're wearing my father's ring!
I'm speaking to you through my father's ring. I've bestowed magic powers upon it...
I beg of you, please avenge my father!
The nightmare in Ravek Canyon killed my father!
If you carry out my request, I'll give you something precious. You have my word!
If you don't know what a nightmare is,
then ask Illodia at the Eastern Guard Post in Gribade!
My father and I have been avenged thanks to you.
Now I can finally leave Elysea...
Now I can finally leave Elysea...
